mapper.select: select order_no as orderNo, member_no as memberNo, order_date as orderDate, order_quan as orderQuan, order_status as orderStatus, shipping_name as shippingName, shipping_addr as shippingAddr, shipping_phone as shippingPhone, (select member_name from member m where m.member_no = o.member_no) as ordererName from order_tbl o where member_no = #{memberNo} order by 3 desc
